articles.title: This American CEO earned mind-boggling $900 million in one year. All you need to know about the deal | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Blackstone Chief Executive Officer Steve Schwarzman took home $896.7 million last year, a 30% drop from a year earlier.
articles.content: Blackstone Inc. Chief Executive Officer Steve Schwarzman took home $896.7 million last year, a 30% drop from a year earlier, yet still one of the biggest annual payouts on record in high finance.  Sc… [+2646 chars]

articles.title: US Spaceship Lying Sideways After Tipping Over During Moon Touchdown - NDTV
articles.description: The first American spaceship to the Moon since the Apollo era is probably lying sideways following its dramatic landing, the company that built it said Friday, even as ground controllers work to download data and surface photos.
